text: The algorithm optimizes network flows. It is used in large software systems and represents a core model for routing.
Cells divide and proteins fold. Biology often explores how an organism adapts to an environment. Evolution is a process.
The canvas is a metaphor for memory. A painting captures what the novel cannot, or so the curator claims.
The market reacts to policy changes. Investors price risk and capital costs. Volatility is elevated.
The team won the match after a dramatic score. The coach said it was classic.
A state election sets the government agenda. Policy is defined in a manifesto that represents priorities.
